name: ToastProvider
description: Provides a context for creating and managing toasts.

limit.description:
The maximum number of toasts that can be displayed at once.
When the limit is reached, the oldest toast will be removed to make room for the new one.

toastManager.description: A global manager for toasts to use outside of a React component.

timeout.description:
The default amount of time (in ms) before a toast is auto dismissed.
A value of `0` will prevent the toast from being dismissed automatically.
